document.full_text: on wednesday, as new details continue to emerge about the killing of osama bin laden during an american raid in pakistan this week, the lede provides updates on breaking news and charts the global reaction.
document.title: the lede: updates on the killing of bin laden, may 4
lines_and_colors: on wednesday, as new details continue to emerge about the killing of osama bin laden during an american raid in pakistan this week, the lede provides updates on breaking news and charts the global reaction.
